TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewRowEventHandler(object sender, GridViewRowEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewRowEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewRowEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewRowEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewRowEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewRowEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，必須建立在控制項中的每個資料列的物件。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each row in the control. 引發資料列中每次建立控制項。The event is raised each time a row in the control is created. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs. 同樣地，在控制項中的每個資料列必須繫結至之前的資料來源中的記錄可以呈現控制項。Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the control can be rendered. 資料資料列時，就會引發事件 (由物件) 中的資料繫結控制項。The event is raised when a data row (represented by a object) is bound to data in the control. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，例如修改繫結的資料列，此事件發生時的值。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入委派給事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEventHandler/CS/gridviewroweventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowEventHandler/VB/gridviewroweventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將委派給事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/CS/gridviewrowdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDataBound/VB/gridviewrowdataboundvb.aspx#1)]
